dcterms:description: A drone-based vehicle trajectory dataset for safety-oriented research and digital twins, capturing continuous trajectories along an extended highway segment.
dcterms:title: CitySim

dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator that provides pre-implemented vehicle models, control and physics, road geometry, and traffic management modules for simulating driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: CARLA
